_sText:
I made this in about 2 days, I'm currently in the proccess of polishing what I have.

It's a rather short 1 stage map, with a challenging boss, and lengthier holds.

Maybe there could be more running, but for now it is what it is.

Enjoy~.


UPDATE! b8_2 has visual improvements, these are currently not shown in the map screenshots.
Better lightning. Actually fixed some of the buttons too, so this you cant spam with.
First ZE map..

ZE_FORGOTTEN_FACILITY
******************************************
Map made by: Westsid3r
******************************************

***STORY
Back in the days, a secret toxic waste facility was built by scientists of the US. The government sent all their toxic chemicals to this underground facility in Mexico, in order to cease the radiation. What the government didn't know, is that the scientists were developing a virus, which would harm the whole world. After testing the virus on pigs, something odd happened. The pigs suddenly rose from the dead, mutating into horrible beasts, which broke through the security gates and slayed all the scientists. No contact with the US army has ever been made since then...

The police forces were sent to the toxic facility, which now has been shut down for a couple of years. As the police forces arrive, they sence how the air smells rotten and that the atmosphere is doubtful. After a long walk back in to the facility, they finally spot the source of the virus outbreak. The mutated pigs had already escaped, but there was one more left, which was the mother of them all. When one of the police tries to put it down, it strikes back and infects him. This was of course not seen by anybody else than the infected, who also tries to hide it. As they have fulfilled their task and progress to the exit, the infected suddenly mutates into a flesh seeking beast, which has no other goal than eating meat...
*************************
MAP INFORMATION:
*************************
The map has two spawns, which avoids everybody from getting infected at once. You start down at the first floor, and have to progress upstairs. There are 4 ways to the second floor, either by opening the gate or by using a vent shaft. There you can either run past the toxic waste machines, or take the old elevator, which still is the fastest way. At the final point of the second floor, you have to defend the elevator for 30 seconds. At the final third floor, you'll have to reach the final escape zone, where you will have to call for a rescue vehicle, and wait until it arrives. Goodluck soldier...

There are also 2 secret weapons which were developed by the scientists and are still hidden somewhere in the facility.

Teamplay, experience and survival skills are REQUIRED in order to survive. Luck also has a big matter!

*64 player spawns, 32 T and 32 CT
**At the third floor, when the junk smashers are activated, zombies can disable these by pressing the button in the hidden lab next to it.
***Custom ending music + custom made nuke

You are in a new world where you live in the sky
Run or Fly to the airport and escape from the zombie infection

- 64 players with a human vs zombies start
- There is 4 differents ways to finish the map
- no button to push only touch to activate
- very few custom models : 45 Mo map file

Enjoy and have fun

Inspired and part of the map are from gm_floatingworld_II, credits to freakrules!

V2 (balance version)

- the start is now longer, more time with zombies (+20s)
- add more spot to hide
- zombies regen and respawn
- 15 000 hp for first zombies (add on the boat)
- modify props on lighthouse island to remove the lag that may have
- modify the arrive on lighthouse island, less zombies hunt
- modify timming
- modify teleport desactivation on zombies boat, now they are no more teleport when they are push on it when CT cover before to leave an island
- suppress push trigger in front of fence at start
- fix a bug that may let zm survive to the explosion
- modify CT numbers need to open doors at the last cover, now it's +15 and +30 CT (i/o +20 and +40)
- now there is a double door to cover on top of the airport
- the invisible wall in stairs of the factory now break when you passe the door, take car of jumpy zombies

V1_3

- fix the bug that don’t let zombies go inside the mill
- balance Zombies with add of crates, more space and plank to allow them to hide and not lost all their hp in 1 minute
- balance CT on cover points to help them to run :
    + gate at the factory
    + pipe that fall on level -1 of the bunker
    + maybe add also a falling rock on the lighthouse island after the explosion 
- the sound level can be manage by the user (in game parameters) - Kaemon Tips ^^
- suppress of the CT teleport on CT boat at start (I was too kind)
- add invisible wall on stair’s ramp from lighthouse to avoid to be stuck
- add CT protection to push them the elevator start in the factory, that’s to avoid death
- open of a second way (stairs) at the airport to avoid CT hunting zombies when they arrive
- add gate at the airport that only open when there is more than 40 CT at the end (screen 12), for recall the behind door is open when there is more than 20 CT and the upstairs door is open when there is more than 40 CT, this gate self breaking when this condition is reached
- timing adjustment


V1_2

- more fog for more fps
- no more lag on boat (shadow rendering making lag)
- teleport is activated more longer to avoid !ztele
- correction of the mill entry problem for zombies (teleport always activated)
- mill cover changed
- add invisible wall to avoid CT jump on the floor instead of in water
- modify table by baggage at the airport
- modify airport structure to avoid zombies cut thru the floor
- CT anti falling return
- correction of factory door that could be blocked
- enlarge factory
- enlarge bunker entry and second floor cover
- more cover at the end depending of the numbre of CT
- fix bug map on factory island (zombies can go to the end with long jump)


V1_1

- lag boat fixed
- crash at the end of waterfall island fixed
- boat arrive changed (removed moving trailer for more fps)
- balance adjustments (adding / moving some crate / time adjustment / adding some ways on bunker / factory islands)
- adding music
- spelling correction for chat help
- some little glitchs fixed too
- increase fog and added distance on little props for more FPS
- anti falldown for CT removed (boat are working well), don't edge too much ^^

New Version Available
=====================
Visit http://www.gamebanana.com/csszm/maps/164537 for the new version of this map. It fixes gameplay and balance issues. This map will remain here for archiving purposes.

ze\_FireWaLL\_lab\_epidemic\_v1a
================================
Map made for FireWaLL // Zombie @ IP: 206.212.243.130:27015
Join us for more custom maps and a great community!
www.FireWaLLCS.net/forums

**This map requires Mani Admin Plugin for messages to work correctly

FEATURES
========
- Cubemaps
- Hints / Areaportals (Optimization)
- LDR
- Supports 64 players
- Around 7 minutes of roundtime
- Original idea obstacles
- Exciting music

INTRODUCTION AND GAMEPLAY
=========================
This map is a prelude to ze\_FireWaLL\_laboratory\_v1c
http://www.fpsbanana.com/maps/144195

In this prelude, you escape from the interiors of the laboratory, thus it will be an entirely indoors map.

The map is designed to be unique. Unlike other escape maps of just running to the end and pressing a button to nuke the zombies, this map consists of 3 portions.

The first part is mainly camping and holding back zombies while waiting for doors to open.
The second part comprises of running all the time through the test laboratories.
The final part is the nuke. Unlike other escape maps, in this map, you need to run to a safe spot after you press the nuke. You have a fair amount of time to escape to the exit of the facility, before the laboratory self destructs.

<object width="480" height="385"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/VgslQAUDHSM?fs=1&hl=en_GB"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/VgslQAUDHSM?fs=1&hl=en_GB" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true" width="480" height="385"></embed></object>

CREDITS
=======
Many thanks to eric, reacz, TopHATTwaffle, Antony, MaiK\_ and AmstaFF for the awesome custom textures.

Credits to VALVe as well. This map contains imported textures from Portal. Also contains musics from Half-Life 2 and Alien Swarm.

Special thanks to FireWaLL community for beta testing and support.

Update Available
================
Visit http://www.gamebanana.com/csszm/maps/164711 for the latest update to this map.

ze\_FireWaLL\_laboratory\_v1c
==========================
Features:

**High Difficulty
High amount of teamwork is required.

**Originality
From original idea traps to riding a big truck on the road to hitching a ride on a modern train to firing a nuclear missile, this map will definately entertain you.

**Storyline
Not just another senseless escape map where you escape out of nowhere to nowhere.

**More than 64 x 2 spawn spots
You will definately get to play on the map even on a fully populated server. 

A secret laboratory in a mountainous area has been researching on the zombie species for the past decades. One day, one of the most toxic viruses on one of the zombie specimens, zombochloroflorine, got into the bodies of some scientists at the laboratory and infected them. Your colleagues and you have managed to gather at the emergency exit of the facility, and now have to flee to nearest train station and hitch a ride out of the area, or be converted into a mindless zombie.

*Notes- First door needs a lot of teamwork to break as they have 2000 hp.

Map By: FW -=LightningZLaser=-

Special Thanks to: *-=Leb=-, FW -=ANBU=- (GoPinoY) and FW -=iSETHEN=- for ideas

Texture Credits: karatekafer (Skybox)
Prefab Credits: Creat_1 (Boat)

==========www.FireWaLLCS.net/forums==========

This map is the 2nd part of ze\_FireWaLL\_laboratory\_part1\_3 (http://www.gamebanana.com/csszm/maps/164537)

UPDATE
======
This map is an updated version of ze\_FirewaLL\_laboratory\_part2\_2 (http://www.gamebanana.com/csszm/maps/164711) and  ze\_FirewaLL\_laboratory\_part2\_1 (http://www.gamebanana.com/csszm/maps/161173)

part2_3 update features:

- A door on the left side of the train will open 10 seconds after it reaches the nuclear station.
- Nuclear facility blast doors will close when rocket launches. Anybody not in the nuke-room will be killed.
- Cable Car movespeed increased by 100
- Pole rider movespeed increased by 100
- Red metal containers now break together with the boxes when humans past the boat point, and will break after 10 seconds instead of 6.
- Ledge beside ticket gate (which was breakable) HP decreased from 500 to 200
- Sun brightness increased by 100

part2_2 update features:

- Made map easier for zombies. Some obstacles will be completely cleared once humans reach a certain point. A shortcut has been added which will open once the truck leaves.
- Environment has been changed to completely grass and trees environment, a change from the old boring desert terrain.
- The laboratory looks more collapsed and destroyed at the spawn area.
- Doors near the start are now physboxes which swing on their hinges. Needs 1000 damage to enable their motion.
- Added smoke to the engine of the boat
- Fixed glitchy looking wheels on truck
- Added some colored sprites on the train to make it look better
- When train leaves, zombies will be able to chase it in the tunnel, as a path will open up, although they will never be able to kill the humans (they will still get nuked in the tunnel). It is something for zombies to do so they don't get bored.

FEATURES
========
- Interesting Obstacles
- Intersting ending
- Storyline
- 64 x 2 spawnpoints
- Highly optimized

A secret laboratory in a hilly area has been researching on the zombie species for the past decades. One day, one of the most toxic viruses on one of the zombie specimens, zombochloroflorine, got into the bodies of some scientists at the laboratory and infected them. Your colleagues and you have managed to gather at the emergency exit of the facility, and now have to flee to nearest train station and hitch a ride out of the area, or be converted into a mindless zombie.

This map was made and designed for FireWaLL // Zombie.

Visit us at www.FireWaLLCS.net/forums.

New Version Available
=====================
Visit http://www.gamebanana.com/csszm/maps/164711 for the updated version of this map.

ze\_FireWaLL\_laboratory\_part2\_1
==============================
This map is an update of ze\_FireWaLL\_laboratory\_v1c (http://www.gamebanana.com/maps/144195).

It fixes bugs caused by a recent steam update.

In addition, a number of areas have been improved, with the final area completely remade. The map now also features high and smooth framerates.

____________________________________________________
____________________________________________________

Features:

**Originality
From original idea traps to riding a big truck on the road to hitching a ride on a modern train to firing a nuclear missile, this map will definitely entertain you.

**Storyline
Not just another senseless escape map where you escape out of nowhere to nowhere.

**More than 64 x 2 spawn spots
You will definately get to play on the map even on a fully populated server. 

A secret laboratory in a mountainous area has been researching on the zombie species for the past decades. One day, one of the most toxic viruses on one of the zombie specimens, zombochloroflorine, got into the bodies of some scientists at the laboratory and infected them. Your colleagues and you have managed to gather at the emergency exit of the facility, and now have to flee to nearest train station and hitch a ride out of the area, or be converted into a mindless zombie.

*Notes- First door needs a lot of teamwork to break as they have 2000 hp.

Map By: FW -=LightningZLaser=-

Special Thanks to: *-=Leb=-, FW -=ANBU=- (GoPinoY) and FW -=iSETHEN=- for ideas

Texture Credits: karatekafer (Skybox)
Prefab Credits: Creat_1 (Boat)

==========www.FireWaLLCS.net/forums==========

Map made for FireWaLL // Zombie @ IP: 206.212.243.130:27015
Join us for more custom maps and a great community!
www.FireWaLLCS.net/forums

**For the best experience, Mani Admin Plugin is recommended, although game messages will still work correctly without it.

UPDATE
======
This map is an update to ze\_FireWaLL\_lab\_epidemic\_v1a. It fixes texture issues occuring after a CS:S update, as well as extends the map slightly, as well as fixes several other issues.

- Now Mani Admin Plugin is not required to display game messages, although ma_csay is used at the end of the map to make it more exciting.
- Fixed texture glitches
- Starting doors now have buttons beside each of them (don't need to run to press the one in the middle anymore)
- Fixed orange crates breaking from grenades
- Humans now hold the conference room using an iron curtain style defense (no more white table on its side). A line of metal racks now form the "entrance" into the room.
- The fence beside the Heaven Portal room will now be open until a zombie comes nearby it. The wall beside the fence has been changed to glass.
- Almost all gates when closed due to zombies being nearby them, will re-open faster.
- Entrance to the Laboratory is no longer a small hole formed by wooden boxes. Instead, it is also an iron curtain now.
- A ladder will appear after humans passed the Panel Walk, so zombies do not need to take the small and narrow stairs anymore.
- The glass just before the zombie will break when humans pass a certain point. (The metal "steps" as well will break).
- The fans before the elevator now push zombies back at a lower strength.
- There are now ladders in the Cable Car room (the massive metal room with the cable car) on the other platform (side), so zombies do not need to balance their way across anymore. If they still wish to, the bars above the cable car have been multiplied that it is no longer narrow.
- A new epic music track from Portal 2 has been added. When the self-destruct button is pressed, either the new track or the old one will be randomly played.
- The escape sequence portion of the map has been slightly extended. You have to run more carefully and faster now as time is a lot tighter
- The narrow "tube" beneath the credits signboard has been blocked (it was impossible to get humans underneath it).
- Cake has been added. Get it if you really want to.

FEATURES
========
- Cubemaps
- Hints / Areaportals (Optimization)
- LDR
- Supports 64 players
- Around 7 minutes of roundtime
- Original idea obstacles
- Exciting musics

INTRODUCTION AND GAMEPLAY
=========================
This map is a prelude to ze\_FireWaLL\_laboratory\_part2\_2
(http://www.gamebanana.com/csszm/maps/164711)

In this prelude, you escape from the interiors of the laboratory, thus it will be an entirely indoors map.

The map is designed to be unique. Unlike other escape maps of just running to the end and pressing a button to nuke the zombies, this map consists of 3 portions.

The first part is mainly camping and holding back zombies while waiting for doors to open.
The second part comprises of running all the time through the test laboratories.
The final part is the nuke. Unlike other escape maps, in this map, you need to run to a safe spot after you press the nuke. You have a fair amount of time to escape to the exit of the facility, before the laboratory self destructs.

Changelog v6 7
==============
- Final version
- 5 Difficulties: Easy-Hard-Extreme-Epic-Godmode
- 1 ZM round with Chocoborace for Difficulty Selection
- Characters enabled on Easy-Hard-Extreme
- Great FFXII/epic music for all modes (soundtrack included in screenshot)
- Fixed a lot of things! (ZR infection timers, magicks, bosses, holds, meteor breakable, details, extra AFK TP)
- Optimized the map
- 1 Final Fantasy 7 Easteregg (tip: only the best servers will find it ^^)
Thanks
==================
Thanks to Square Enix to make this beautiful game FFXII :)

I want to thank also all the testers, server admins and players for helping to create this wonderful map. 

**This is the final version, i hope u like it and good luck finishing all modes ;)**

_sText:
*1. Zombie escape Temple of the Ancients by Microsoft Edge and DarkRoad Another map based in the game FFVII (Final Fantasy 7)

*Credits: Nano HaRyDe Moltard Batnik_Ref_smd.

*Map have only 4 stages/levels (2 normal levels and 2 with extreme mode)

* 5 items for humans: Ice, Fire, Poison, Earth, Wind

* 4 boss fight + 2 mini bosses + 3 Sephiroth hard lasers Incluiding Cloud, Aeris and Sephiroth models.

* I don't like Doorhugers, so in this map, the humans need to defend Cloud, it's a NPC with movements and he only can trigger the doors. 

*If zombies knife Cloud and kill him, the round it's over.

*Any bug/glitch or something help just contact me or contact DarkRoad, enjoy it!

Mako Reactor official victory of v1_3 by ICannt server!:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I4U45aHzZho
Non official victory of v1_3 by ICannt server:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jAHtUiWyCxc Biggest changes from V2.1 to V2.2: - Using a Materia that doesn't belong to you will ignite you and most of the time keep burning you until yo die. The system is not perfect, but helps discouraging Materia Griefers and makes them easier to spot for admins who can punish them accordingly. - Fixed a bug that was causing lots of rounds to have only Ultima and Earth Materia on them. - Sighly increased Bahamuth HP per player. - Ultima can no longer be used by Zombies when its still on his spawning spot. - Reduced 1 minute the duration of the ZM rounds. - Fixed a glitch that allowed people to go on top of the Pub on the City Area. - Dodging Sephiroth's last attack on Extreme now grants 100 aditional points to all who make it. - Sighly changed Gravity mechanics, now it doesn't completly freeze the zombies within; on the game gives the same result. - One un-used door was removed; the secondary door on the first hold position is now deeper in the wall to prevent getting teleported inside to people that prefer to take that door. - Fixed minor bugs; like removing the cornise near Sephiroth's corridor. - Prevented unwanted-teleport-spam for zombies falling on some blind spots on the top of the trains, at the begging of the round. - Now there is no door for the Button's Room on Extreme; some people keep trying to go there and believed the locked door to have juts bugged. You can't use buttons on Extreme. - Removed the door on the Big Room that leaded to the Vent Way; it was always open by the time someone reached it. (VERSION 1_4 IS BUGGED, VICTORY WILL NOT COUNT, V1_4_1 COMING)
DEMOS WILL BE COMPARED FOR THE FIRSTS DAYS (UNTIL 17-10-2010) ----- MAP NEW UPDATES ------
- All bugs of v1_4_1 fixed. - Contest! Win the extreme mode to write your names in the map! - Fps improved. - No camp spots. - Heal+ and Heal++ new materia. - Better timing on some spots. - New music: random music for hard (two new songs), new song for extreme. - Spawning ladders at the elevator fixed (at last defense spot). - Force infection on extreme mode. - No glitch at core (zombie teleportation) - Force infection on spawn: zombies at vagoons have 50.000 of hp (later, will be restored to 7.500) - New bahamut hp system : more easy with more people, impossible for few people. - Grenades hurt more to Bahamut. (minors) - "10 seconds fence door" at spawn opens automatically when the "30s door" opens. - Ultima countdown message. - Spelling mistakes fixed. - Force zombie teleport at spawn in extreme mode. V1_3
  • Harder spawn: +1 to +3 zombies at spawn, zombies spawn near the humans (more intense spawn).
  • Balance at some parts: players can't jump at the first descending (after the elevator scene), and zombies can't arrive before humans.
  • Bahamut: grenades affect him, with a lot of damage.
  • Changed the position two materias (magics): one of the random places of earth and ultima has been changed.
  • Crash prevent coz shooting materias (magics)
  • Ztele/Zspawn problem after massive teleport fixed.
  • Color correction (red colour) fixed at extreme-mode.
  • Ice materia is more effective.
  • Wind materia ++ is more powerful.
  • Materias are now elites with 200 of ammo.
  • No auto-heal at core. Heal magic will be more decisive.
  • Zombies have 50.000 of HP in extreme mode.
  • In hard and extreme mode: +0.75 seconds to Sephiroth, +1.5 seconds to the bridge. FFVII MAKO REACTOR MAP Made by Hannibal[SPA] (Rafuron)
    Opinions/Ideas Maese Danielot Tested by ZES, GeClan, SupremeElite, FRAGXL, Hellz and InfinitiveGear community. ---- MAP SPECIAL FEATURES
    6 MAGICS
    ::Ice (upgradeable) -> freezes an enemy -> + freezes all enemies in a row -> ++ freezes all enemies around you.
    ::Fire (upgradeable) -> burn an enemy -> + a fire wall that hurts and burn -> ++ a big area that hurts and burn.
    ::Wind (upgradeable) -> slow zombies in a row -> + push away zombies in a row -> ++ push zombies near you (360º protection)
    ::Earth -> spawns a wall (during 5 seconds)
    ::Heal -> heal near humans
    ::Ultima -> kills near zombies (casting takes 20 seconds) 4 DIFFICULTY MODES (everytime you beat a mode, you go to the next difficulty mode)
    ::EASY
    ::MEDIUM
    ::HARD
    ::EXTREME 3 DIFFERENT FINAL BOSSES DIFFERENT WAYS CUSTOM MODELS/SOUNDS/COLOR CORRECTION/TEXTURES NPC SHOWS YOUR WAY Map based on Final Fantasy VII, the first stage of the game, where Cloud must put a bomb and escape. Magics/Monsters/Sounds are based on final fantasy world. Profit :)

v1_1 Update 22/09/2015
The map contest has begun!
The features:
1)Added 2 zombie materias
2)Bosses fix (Gi Nattak minions)
3) Added more effects, remade end airship
4) Bugfixes, bugfixes, bugfixes...

v2 Update 21/10/2015
The contest has ended. Congtats to all who made it on the contest board! New version has tons of features, the main are:
1) Added a lot of new detail.
2) Most of materias are spawing randomly, so its about 5-6 human items per round.
3) Added HP bars for main boses and added more effects on bossfights.
4) Added 1 more ZM item: "Zombie Poison".
5) Changed map team balance, added new holding points, some of old holding points got harder to defend.
6) Changed map ending (on "Rage Mode").
7) Changed player admin room access way on "ZM Round"
8) Remade "Shinra" location.
9) Added 1 more mini-boss on "Hard Mode" and "Extreme Mode" endings.
10) New ending of "Normal Mode"
11) New music on "Rage Mode"

v2_1 update:
1) Bug fixes
2) Changed Gi Nattak HP system and added new HP bar texture

v4 and v4fix updates:
-Added random events(cuz it would be impossibly hard to beat the map if we keep all of them together) 
-Changed some particle effects 
-Nerfed ALL the bosses HP, added more items/nades damage on them. 
-Added Cactuar and Bomb summons 
-Added new sidequest 
-Airship Rage Mode ending is back in this version. 
-Fixed immortal zombies on Rage Mode 
-Added more detail 
-Remade some hold spots
- Fixed chocobo that can be picked up by human 
- Fixed nova attack that doesn't stop when Gi Nattack dies 
- Fixed points bug at "Rage Mode" end 
- Fixed map text and chests sidequest 
- Fixed "ERROR" model in the Gi Cave 

- Optimizing: props and fire particles (it will give ~5-10 more fps) 
- The main feature: no need to upload the config with the map, the map set all the commands that was in the config automatically. 
- Changed map entwatch config: all the items but zm items are N/A now, due to glitches on Gi Nattak fight.


Official STEAM group: http://steamcommunity.com/groups/headshooterandlonlly Also, recommened to install the config to your server, that is packed in the archive

64.102.5.163:27015 CS:S Zombie Escape - Zombiemodturkey.com Server

Zombie Escape in legoland!

This Map was originally made in only a few days and for a small ze community, some people asked for us to release this for others, so we decided to work on it a bit more to make it a bit more interesting and entertaining. The map name is totally random so don't mind that, as are parts of the map that makes no sense at all.

Map Features:

  • 3 Normal Levels and 3 Extreme Levels.
  • 6 Different Bosses that try to wipe out all the humans!(Nades do alot of damage to them, Use Them!)
  • 6 special items for humans that appear in random locations around spawn area!
    • Pushgun - Pushes the zombies, cooldown is 45 seconds, Unlimited uses.
    • Heal - Heals nearby humans to 200hp, Only 1 use
    • Flamethrower - Burns and hurts zombies, lasts for 20 seconds. (can turn it on and off etc..)
    • Mines - If a zombie steps on the mine, it explodes dealing 750 damage to nearby zombies. Can use up to 5!
    • Grenade Maker - Makes grenades, can make up to 8 grenades.
    • Lego maker - Creates small lego walls, lego walls have 75hp and you can make up to 8 of them.
All the special items are filtered so others can't spam them!

V1 Changelog

  • Normal mode got a lot of tweaking and balancing, several hold points were made easier.
  • Zombie spawn time is delayed by a few seconds on Normal Difficulty.
  • Normal Level 3 got a new interesting Boss.
  • All the extreme levels now have a different boss from the normal ones, all of them very challenging and interesting/funny.
  • Some of the Normal Mode music was replaced with new, more appealing music.
  • Overall more detail to the map.
  • Fixed items that spawned on the same spot.
  • Lots of new custom particles.
  • All the items now have a button showing what item you have, instead of only the console message.
  • Zombies get 50k hp every 45 seconds on Extreme mode.
3 New items:

~ Ammo box: Gives unlimited ammo for 10 seconds, 60 seconds recharge. (Unlimited uses)

~ Handcannon: Shoots a lego brick which damages zombies. 2 seconds recharge (Unlimited uses)

~ UberCannon: A big gun that shoots a powerful laser dealing 30k damage to the zombies, 150 seconds recharge.(Unlimited uses)
  • Lego maker now has 10 uses, and double the health.
  • New spawn locations for items.
  • Healing Item: heals 220 hitpoints now, instead of 200.

V1FIX CHANGELOG

  • Fixed a few gamebreaking issues.
  • Lego maker blocks now break 20 seconds after it is spawned.
  • Replaced a few more songs on normal mode.

V1_1 CHANGELOG

  • Made holds on normal mode easier.
  • Edited some hold times on extreme mode.
  • Level 3 boss on extreme was remade and is now very hard and challenging.
  • Fixed zombie hp triggers on extreme mode.
  • Fixed a few "glitchy" boxes on extreme mode.
  • Handcannon item got tweaked a bit and should be a lot more useful now.
  • Lightning on extreme is every 8 seconds now instead of 10.
  • Normal level 3 boss has a bit more hp and does a bit more damage.
  • Flamethrower,handcannon and "ubercannon" do damage to the last boss, so use them!
This will be the last and final version. (Unless something game breaking happens)

V1_2 CHANGELOG

  • Fixed and lowered Extreme 3 boss's hp
  • Landmine damage increase
  • Landmine won't move when somebody runs over it.
  • Decreased handcannon cooldown.
  • After u beat the map, a mapvote will start next round.

ESCAPE THE EYE
By GARGANTUA

Map Information 
64 Spawnpoints
3-D Skybox
Cubemaps
Several traps
Alternative ways towards the ending
Several secret routes
Custom textures
Natural environment
Waterfall
Unique nuke with The Eye

The Legend
A long time ago, an advanced extraterrestial race coexisted with humans on this forgotten island. They never interfered with each other and kept peace for years. One day, the aliens decided to build a huge machine called The Eye which would function as a teleporter between the island and their homeworld. When the aliens did their first test with this teleporter all the humans and aliens of the island were killed during the process. Instead of The Eye being a teleporter, a technical mistake was made by the aliens which made this device turned out to be a doomsday device killing every living creature on the island.
Years later, new humans arrived and colonized the island. A pact among humans was made not to enter the former alien living zone because of the danger which could be caused by The Eye. A gate was placed in front of the working mine and any trespassenger would be punished by death. These rules were made because The Eye must never see again. 

Present Day
You are an inhabitant of the island and you work at the navy warehouse together with your teammates.A deadly virus was shipped in by a foreign boat which turns your teammates into bloodlusting zombies! You see no other option but to run back to the valley and destroy the gate that is blocking the mine which will gain acces to The Eye. You are the only one who can activate The Eye and who can save your town! But the fearsome zombies are not your only danger. Even though the alien race is long gone, their defence system which contains turrets and traps are still active. The humans assumed this information because those who once trespassed the gate and tried reaching The Eye have never returned home.


Personal Note
This is supposed to be my comeback map after I took a break 8 months ago. This map is a hybrid of different ideas I had back then. So I hope the different elements make it a kickass map to play. I am very satisfied with the outcome anyway. 
About the map: It took me around 5 weeks to complete. It's a rather heavy map to play. So people with low-end PC's might have some struggling playing it. I am very sorry about this, I tried a lot of optimisation and did my best for those with low-end PC's.


Credits
Primary maptesters: Krassell, Mononoke, Masen (Thanks a lot guys!!)
Secondary maptesters: i3D forum - JohhnyB, Chimera, PimpJuice, Frauenarzt, Kale Aap, Advaldo, 5unz, JobForACowBow, Westsid3r, Eastsider, WhiteTiger, Kraven, Exodus, Glad All Over, Skael, Hi'nk.  
Custom textures by: Disturbed, Nubblecakes

Have fun playing it! 

- GARGANTUA

ZE_ELEVATOR_ESCAPE__FINAL

Map Description

The nuclear core has become unstable, you must escape the facility via the final elevator. Before you reach the final elevators you will have to use other elevators and cross other obstacles to reach the last elevators.

Once you are at the final elevators you will have to make your way to the rescue zone, where there is a radio in which you must use to self destruct the nuclear core bunker in order to stop a wide scale disaster.

*** FINAL UPDATE 2 ***

- Removed ladders from last lift hold points, replaced them with boxs

*** FINAL UPDATE ***

- Reworked and added alot of geometry to the map

- Both final lifts open at same time, no matter which elevator you pick

- Added breakable gate at top of final lifts

- Can no longer shoot the breakable parts on the rail in water

- Added AFK Killer

- Added models for buttons and ladders

- More detail

- More optimization

- Removed wooden boards from middle path lift at spawn

***Updates v6***

- Added more strenght to the beam holding rocks up

- Changed the water textures

- Alinged the textures in the lifts

- Added doors to the second set of lifts, this is so people cant skip the new route at top of lift

- Made the shortcut route of the upper water part more noticable as people would not see it and just go by it

- Made the path that leads to the safe zone wider so it is easier for zombies to attack at this point

- Changed textures in various places and added more detail to the map

- More optimized

***Updates v5***

- Added more health to beam holding rocks up, this will hopefull stop the selfish players from shooting rocks down on teammates

- Made the higher route at the water transportation cart quicker to get to the end then the lower walking route

- Added a small jumping part to the lower walking route at the water transportation cart

- Added a extra part for the humans to defend at the final elevators. This should encourage the zombies to attack more at this part

- Fixed the Water Pool, it is much more reliable and consistent now so no more waiting in the pool for ages like sometimes in v4

- Removed the small boards at the top of the ladders in the elevators after the water pool and instead humans go through a new part added at this section, they still exit at the same point as before

- Changed some minor geometry around the map

- Optimization

- Made the middle route at the start a bit more rewardng for the players that decide to use it, the boards dont have as much strength and the lift is faster then the others

***Updates v4***

- More Detail

- Fixed people been pushed under the floor by the lifts ( Player will be teleported near by )

- Added breakable gates at first lift exits ( Improves gameplay on servers where zombie spawns after 10 secs )

- 3D Skybox

- More Optimization

- Added more time on first lifts ( extra time to break gates )

- Added/Changed box stacks at end of map

- Player clipped rocks at end of map so player cant get behind the rock

- Added a small transportation cart to the water ( only humans can use it )

ZE_ECHO_SNOWESCAPE_V3B

Recommended Players: 24-32
Maximum Players: 64

This map is the sequel to ze_echo_escape.
While the layout is similar, the gameplay is completely different.

This map has been tested on the ZombieMurder community servers and is approaching its final stages. I wanted to give out a little Christmas gift for everyone, so I shrived to get the gameplay to be flawless. Thanks a bunch to everyone who was involved in its creation.

I've made the following video to show to everyone what this new version is all about, as in my opinion, it's a whole lot better than the original ze_echo_escape. The video is lengthy, as it shows every possible way into the complex, but you can skip around if you'd like. Either way, I HIGHLY recommend you watch some of it before you comment or review the map.

ZE_DUST_ESCAPE_V1 Created By: Grey Echo (£cho/Ech0) Maximum Number of Players: 64 Recommended Players: 24-32 This map has been throughly tested for release by the ZombieMurder community. Please click on their name to visit the community's forums and take a look around if you wish. Many of their servers are also running the map if you'd wish to test it. This map is on the small said for an escape map and is in no way complete. As of right now, I do believe it is the best escape map I've made, but the detail does need some work. It just came out of beta after fixing most of the bugs with the map, but the gameplay is good as humans appear to win 45-50% of the time. V2 will most likely be released early next month (February 2008), and this version was a prerequisite to this for me. It will include a lot of gameplay improvements, but trust me when I say this map is 100% playable, no doubt about it, and it plays VERY well the way it is now. Thanks and enjoy. As always comments, assessments, and stamps are more than welcome. Regards, £cho Official FPSBanana ZombieMod Representative Creator of Headcrab Hunter 2
